code: MatcherAssert.assertThat("Can't copy InputStream to OutputStream byte by byte",new TextOf(new ReaderOf(new TeeInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(content.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)), baos))).asString(),Matchers.allOf(Matchers.equalTo(content),Matchers.equalTo(new String(baos.toByteArray(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8))))
